body_html: tf.contrib.summary is usable now for both graph and eager execution. See the documentation in the package for instructions on how to enable it. The only caveat is that it is not compatible with legacy tf.summary, so you need to choose (thankfully switching just means turning tf.summary.* into tf.contrib.summary.*).

body: tf.contrib.summary is usable now for both graph and eager execution. See the documentation in the package for instructions on how to enable it. The only caveat is that it is not compatible with legacy tf.summary, so you need to choose (thankfully switching just means turning tf.summary.* into tf.contrib.summary.*).
